title: Sausage and Rice Stuffed Squash
ingredients: ['1 1/2 (120g) packets chicken savoury rice, such as Batchelors, prepared according to packet instructions', '450g cumberland sausages, casings removed and discarded', '1 medium acorn squash, halved and seeded', '60g chopped apple', '1 dessertspoon crushed coriander seeds', '60g grated mature Cheddar cheese']
